scripts.build:declaration: tsc --project tsconfig.json --outDir build/cjs && tsc --project tsconfig.json --outDir build/module
scripts.build: yarn build:esmodule && yarn build:commonjs && yarn build:declaration
scripts.build:esmodule: BABEL_MODULES=esmodule BABEL_ENV=build babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir build/module --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --delete-dir-on-start
scripts.build:commonjs: BABEL_MODULES=commonjs BABEL_ENV=build babel src --root-mode upward --out-dir build/cjs --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --delete-dir-on-start
